content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for your interest in our apartment. content: I agree to the price of 2,200 Euro. I want to sign the rental agreement as soon as possible. Can you send me the details of the rental agreement?

content: Of course, Hassan. I am glad that the rental price of 2,200 Euro per month works for you. I will prepare the rental agreement and send it to you as soon as possible. content:

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am glad to hear that the rental agreement meets your requirements.

Regarding the security deposit, I will send you a bank transfer to your account with the amount of 1,100 Euros. Please note that the security deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled all the terms and conditions of the rental agreement.

As for any additional fees, please note that there is no fee for moving in or out of the apartment. However, you will be responsible for paying the monthly rent of 2,200 Euros on the 1st of each month.
